spec_data.Name: yum-plugin-versionlock
spec_data.Description:
This plugin takes a set of name/versions for packages and excludes all other
versions of those packages (including optionally following obsoletes). This
allows you to protect packages from being updated by newer versions,
for example.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:02:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Yum plugin to lock specified packages from being updated
